sub_title: Global Procurement Category Manager Steel & Tools at Cordstrap - The Passion to Protect
summary:
Pro-active, pragmatic self-starter with strong commercial mindset.
Procurement professional with 13+ years' procurement, sales and trading experience in direct materials steel, plastics/petrochemicals, and metal products, working with suppliers in Asia, Europe, USA, and Middle East. 

As an organized and detail oriented professional, my background lies in strategic sourcing and successfully managing daily operations in global cross functional teams with strong communication and analytical skills to generate superior results while overcoming continuous challenges.

Key Competencies: Global Strategic Sourcing, Category Management, Negotiation, Supplier Development, External Manufacturing, Stakeholder (Intercultural) Management, Contract Management, Project Management, Technical Affinity, Customer-Centric

Key Skills: Commercial Awareness, Problem-Solving, Critical Thinking, Effective Communication
